title: Trademark - serif and sans serif - MULTIPLE font ID
content:
Looking for a double font ID based off this wheatpaste for the brand Trademark. Looking for an ID on the sans serif used for the logo as well as the brush script used for the 95 Grand Street type. Any help or suggestions would be greatly appreciated!

Best,  
Danny

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150123235705im_/http:/typophile.com/files/IMG_4467_6136.JPG)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [IMG\_4467.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20150123235705/http:/typophile.com/files/IMG_4467.JPG) | 831.68 KB |
author: Danny_Miller

comments.content:
"95 Grand Street" is **[House Holiday Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150123235705/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=House-Industries%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=House%20Holiday%20Gothic%20-%20Regular&fid=d7e721c9bb2ebda67c4c83007df4bace&fsize=60&text=95%20Grand%20Street&fit=1)** by House Industries

"TRADEMARK" looks like **Raisonne (DemiBold)** by Benjamin Critton [Colophon, 2010]:  
 [http://www.colophon-foundry.org/fonts/raisonne/about-font](http://web.archive.org/web/20150123235705/http:/www.colophon-foundry.org/fonts/raisonne/about-font "http://www.colophon-foundry.org/fonts/raisonne/about-font")
